content.question: Which of the following economic consequences to a provisioning ecosystem service will most likely result from increased global warming?

choices.label: The collapse of local fisheries, because of the damage to coral reefs from ocean acidification
Loss of revenue from the oil industry, because of increased oil spills from offshore oil wells
Widespread crop failure, because of increased acid precipitation in agricultural areas
Increased cost for water filtration, because of loss of coastal wetlands

content.answer: The collapse of local fisheries, because of the damage to coral reefs from ocean acidification

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain environmental concepts and processes.
